remarks: Associative identity for the ring of power series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2015.)
statement:
psrring.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
psrring.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
psrring.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
psrass.d $e |- D = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } $.
psrass.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` S ) $.
psrass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
psrass.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
psrass.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
psrass.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
psrass1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X .X. Y ) .X. Z ) = ( X .X. ( Y .X. Z ) ) ) $.
